lines.text: What if... that bullet in the <c=#0000FF>Living Memory...</c> didn't come from the gun?
Like, he took a bullet, threw it into the air, pointed his gun so it'd look like he fired it...
And then the actual gunshot was him shooting himself!
But- no, hold on, that's baloney. Fool the hologram? Why would he do that?
He shouldn't have even known that wizard would have that spell- and he'd be too dead to care who it fooled!
No, wait! One of the wizards did it! Threw a bullet backwards at Slick, who was holding the gun...
And then they could use the spell to lie about who fired it!
They just had a bullet lying around, and threw it with pinpoint accuracy to line up with the gun?
